amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning the expansion of health care coverage.

vote.text: Amendment SA 353 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 353 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Smith. (consideration: CR S4259-4260; text: CR S4259) To express the sense of the Senate concerning the expansion of health care coverage.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 353 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 353 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Smith.
